classNames.root: pl-1 mr-6 bg-base-max text-primary opacity-100 hover:opacity-100

items.name: Workspace
items.tooltip: Gen3 workspaces are secure data analysis environments in the cloud that can access data from one or more data resources.

items.name: Apps
items.tooltip: Learn how to use Jupyter Notebooks to explore and visualize data available by running a tutorial notebook, or use one of these examples as a launching point for your own custom analysis.

items.name: Profile
items.tooltip: Create API keys for programmatic data access, and review your authorization privileges to datasets and services.
